ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Pixie Strike
ygData.msgSnippet: Specific mobs are in a giant class - they cannot be mesmerized nor stunned - not by bards nor by enchanters. The Fire & Ice Giants guarding Nag & Vox are
ygData.messageBody:
Specific mobs are in a "giant" class - they cannot be mesmerized nor stunned
- not by bards nor by enchanters.

The Fire & Ice Giants guarding Nag & Vox are like this - as are a bunch of
other mobs. Crowd control is done with charm or root parking.

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Christopher Sanders [mailto:christopher.sanders@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 07, 2001 12:29 PM
To: Eqbards (E-mail)
Subject: [eqbards] Pixie Strike


Do giants automatically save vs Pixie Strike?

Was in a FM giant group last night that pulled 2, and the one resisted every
strike I threw at it...a good 5 or 6 or so.

Of course, it liked me best after that. :P

Atonal
